Package com.smoketurner.dropwizard.zipkin

Interface ZipkinFactory

  • All Superinterfaces:
    io.dropwizard.jackson.Discoverable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractZipkinFactory, ConsoleZipkinFactory, EmptyZipkinFactory, HttpZipkinFactory, KafkaZipkinFactory, RabbitMQZipkinFactory

    public interface ZipkinFactory
extends io.dropwizard.jackson.Discoverable
    A factory for building HttpTracing instances for Dropwizard applications.
